mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.picture, p.rotate, p.content, p.location, p.together, CASE WHEN p.time > DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL-1 HOUR) THEN CONCAT(MINUTE(TIMEDIFF(NOW(), p.time)), ' MINUTES AGO') WHEN p.time > DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL-24 HOUR) THEN CONCAT(HOUR(TIMEDIFF(NOW(), p.time)), ' HOURS AGO') ELSE CONCAT(DATEDIFF(NOW(), p.time), ' DAYS AGO') END as post_time, u.id as user_id, u.nickname as user_nickname, u.picture as user_picture, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reflection WHERE post_id = p.id) as num_likes, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment WHERE post_id = p.id) as num_comments, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reflection WHERE post_id = p.id AND user_id = #{user_id}) as user_islike FROM post as p LEFT JOIN user as u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE u.isPrivate = 0 ORDER BY p.id DESC
SELECT * FROM post as p LEFT JOIN user as u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE u.id = #{id} ORDER BY p.id DESC

SELECT p.id, p.picture, p.rotate, p.content, p.location, p.together, CASE WHEN p.time > DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL-1 HOUR) THEN CONCAT(MINUTE(TIMEDIFF(NOW(), p.time)), ' MINUTES AGO') WHEN p.time > DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL-24 HOUR) THEN CONCAT(HOUR(TIMEDIFF(NOW(), p.time)), ' HOURS AGO') ELSE CONCAT(DATEDIFF(NOW(), p.time), ' DAYS AGO') END as post_time, u.id as user_id, u.nickname as user_nickname, u.picture as user_picture, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reflection WHERE post_id = p.id) as num_likes, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment WHERE post_id = p.id) as num_comments, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reflection WHERE post_id = p.id AND user_id = #{user_id}) as user_islike FROM post as p LEFT JOIN user as u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (user_id, picture, rotate, content, location, together) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{picture}, #{rotate}, #{content}, #{location}, #{together})
